test-front-matter: 'hello world'
imports:
  import HelloWorld from './hello.js'
---
# Hello World

This is an example component

```render html
<HelloWorld />
```

::: demo 这是描述这是**描述**，点三角可展开代码
```jsx
<button>adfasdfa</button>
```
:::

You can set who to say Hello

```render html
<HelloWorld who="Fernando" />
```
